author: Jon Brodkin
title: Dr. Fauci explains why he doesn’t correct Trump during press conferences
description: When Trump makes mistakes, Fauci tries to "get it corrected for the next time."
content: Enlarge/ WASHINGTON, DC - MARCH 20, 2020: Director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases Dr. Anthony Fauci holds up the "15 Days to Slow the Spread" instruction as US President Donald Trump looks on during a news briefing on the coronav… [+6063 chars]
